subject_terms_3: Portrait photography Peranakan costumes Women Children
physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features two ladies and a child. All of them are looking towards the direction where the photograph was captured. The ladies are dressed in their ethnic costumes. There are large potted plants in the background.
sgcool_label_text:
This photograph shows two Indo Eurasian women in sarong kebayas and a child on the patio. 

With continuous improvement of camera technology, it became possible to take photographs outside a studio in the first decades of the 20th century. Many middle-class families collected photographs in albums as a way of documenting family life, or documentasi keluarga.
title_text: Photograph of two Indo Eurasian and a child on a patio
